name: Bloody Doll
description:
Team 1 CimeArt

An Horror Game, where you have to escape from a creepy wooden doll, seeking for fresh blood. Will you survive ?

Team :

Game Artists : Léonie Claude, Emilien Amouyal, Alison Roger

Concept Artist: Benjamin Faure

Developer :  Mathis Batet, Camille Gréaux, Justine Charonnat
